column1: What is your current level of study?
column2: How long have you been studying at the University of Idaho?
column3: Which region does your home country belong to?
column4: What is your current Cumulative Grade Point Average (CGPA)?
column5: How do you primarily fund your studies?
column6: How often do you participate in campus activities and events?
column7: How easy has it been for you to make friends within the university community?
column8: Which best describes the composition of your closest circle of friends at the university?
column9: If you're interested in making more friends, which group would you prefer to connect with more?
column10: Are you interested in making new friends?
column11: What is your primary source of academic stress?
column12: How would you describe your overall mental health since starting your studies?
column13: How often do you feel stressed due to your studies or life at the university?
column14: How often do you feel lonely?
column15: Do you feel you have adequate support (friends, family, university services) when dealing with stress or mental health issues?
column16: Are you aware of the mental health resources available to you as an international student at the university?
column17: Have you ever used any of the university's mental health resources (counseling, workshops, etc.)?
column18: How has your social life impacted your mental health since joining the university?
column19: How challenging have you found it to adjust to a new cultural environment in terms of your mental well-being?
column20: How often do financial concerns (tuition fees, living expenses) cause you stress?
column21: If you are working part-time, how challenging do you find it to balance work and studies?"
column22: How concerned are you about being able to pay your tuition fees on time?
column23: How satisfied are you with the financial support (scholarships, grants, loans) available to you as an international student?
column24: To what extent do financial worries affect your academic performance and mental health?
column25: Have you ever considered transferring to another university?
column26: If you have considered transferring, what are the main reasons?
column27: What factors contributed to your decision to stay?
column28: How would you rate your overall academic experience at the University of Idaho?
